tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE legal_scholars_research_data (
  researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(50),
  research_topic VARCHAR(100),
  research_data TEXT,
  publication_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ResearchData (
    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    scholar_id UUID REFERENCES LegalScholars(scholar_id),
    data_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    data_description TEXT,
    data_file BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE legal_scholars (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  affiliation VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  research_interests TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE research_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  scholar_id INT,
  data_text TEXT,
  data_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE access_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  access_time TIMESTAMP,
  accessed_table VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Article (
    article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    article_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    publication_date DATE NOT NULL,
    researcher_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES Researcher(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Collaboration (
    collaboration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    collaboration_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    researcher_id_1 INT,
    researcher_id_2 INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id_1) REFERENCES Researcher(researcher_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id_2) REFERENCES Researcher(researcher_id)
);
CREATE TABLE scholars (scholar_id INT PRIMARY KEY, scholar_name VARCHAR(100), research_interests VARCHAR(200), affiliation VARCHAR(100))
CREATE TABLE research_data (data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(200), publication_date DATE, scholar_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (scholar_id) REFERENCES scholars(scholar_id))
CREATE TABLE collaborations (collaboration_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, project_name VARCHAR(200), description TEXT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE))
CREATE TABLE datasets (dataset_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, dataset_name VARCHAR(200), description TEXT, contributor_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (contributor_id) REFERENCES scholars(scholar_id))

CREATE TABLE collaborations_datasets (collaboration_id INT, dataset_id INT, PRIMARY KEY (collaboration_id, dataset_id), FOREIGN KEY (collaboration_id) REFERENCES collaborations(collaboration_id), FOREIGN KEY (dataset_id) REFERENCES datasets(dataset_id))
